'''''J.R.R. Tolkien e a crítica à modernidade''''' is a Brazilian academic book written by Paulo Cristelli.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articlename=JRR Tolkien e a crítica a modernidade|articleurl=http://www.alamedaeditorial.com.br/jrr-tolkien-e-a-critica-a-modernidade/|dated=|website=[http://www.alamedaeditorial.com.br Alameda Editorial]|accessed=26 Feb 2014}}</ref>

==From the publisher==

{{blockquote|Relying on autobiographical material represented by the letters of Tolkien and important theorists of literature and the social sciences, Paul Cristelli makes it clear that Tolkienian fiction springs actually the great crises of the twentieth century: the mechanized wars, genocides scale unprecedented environmental destruction and accelerated by the successive phases of the Industrial Revolution.}}
